last_episode_to_air.name: The Struggle
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Snowfall saga comes to an end.

name: Snowfall
overview: Los Angeles. 1983. A storm is coming and its name is crack. Set against the infancy of the crack cocaine epidemic and its ultimate radical impact on the culture as we know it, the story follows numerous characters on a violent collision course.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season 2 enters 1984, with everyone working toward their ultimate goals of money, power, and influence amid the Los Angeles crack cocaine epidemic.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In Season 3, crack cocaine is spreading like wildfire through South Central Los Angeles, continuing its path of destruction and changing the culture forever.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: In season four, Franklin tries to regain control over his business.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Set in the summer of 1986, Franklin Saint  and his entire family are rich beyond their wildest dreams, on the verge of having everything they've ever wanted... right as the ground begins to fall out from under their feet. The sudden and tragic death of basketball star Len Bias makes the rock cocaine epidemic front-page news, the target of both Democrat and Republican lawmakers. Law enforcement is on a warpath and the militarization of the L.A.P.D. continues as police and politicians decide the only way to deal with this growing scourge is through force - and the creation of the new C.R.A.S.H. (Community Resources Against Street Hoodlums) units. The streets of South Central Los Angeles have never been so dangerous as the Saint family navigates the police, the warring gangs and the CIA.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: It’s October 1986 in this sixth and final season, as civil war threatens to destroy the Saint family. Franklin is desperate and forced to rob his Aunt Louie and Uncle Jerome after being wiped out by former CIA officer Teddy McDonald. Meanwhile, Louie has taken over Franklin’s role as Teddy’s sole buyer, undercutting her nephew and creating a competing empire in the process. Franklin is now faced with losing everyone he loves and everything he’s built, and coming through it all will mean out-maneuvering the KGB, the DEA and the CIA, as well as avoiding the LAPD’s fully militarized, fully corrupt, C.R.A.S.H units.

tagline: An empire is built brick by brick.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: South Central street entreprenuer Franklin Saint takes a leap into the cocaine game. Disgruntled CIA officer Teddy McDonald allies with a Contra soldier. Luchador wrestler Gustavo "El Oso" Zapata makes inroads with a Mexican cartel family.

episodes.name: Make Them Birds Fly
episodes.overview: Franklin struggles with the reality of his new enterprise. Teddy’s distrust of Alejandro escalates. Gustavo confronts his new partners.

episodes.name: Slow Hand
episodes.overview: Franklin enlists help to retrieve his stolen property. In the midst of a weapons deal, Teddy receives an unexpected visitor. Gustavo, Lucia and Pedro seek a fall guy.

episodes.name: Trauma
episodes.overview: Franklin and Leon deal with the thief. Teddy goes to extreme measures to protect the CIA. Lucia and Gustavo connect in the aftermath of the previous night.

episodes.name: seven-four
episodes.overview: Franklin’s indecision causes issues at Jerome’s 4th of July BBQ. Teddy and Alejandro are stranded. Lucia’s family vets Gustavo.

episodes.name: A Long Time Coming
episodes.overview: Franklin turns to Jerome for guidance, resulting in an unexpected encounter; Teddy contemplates a different future for his family; Gustavo and Lucia enlist business partners from Gustavo's past.

episodes.name: Cracking
episodes.overview: Franklin, Leon and Kevin take a game-changing road trip; Teddy deals with a sin from Alejandro's past; Lucia makes Gustavo's partnership official, much to Pedro's dismay.

episodes.name: Baby Teeth
episodes.overview: Franklin's business ramps up, causing a rift in his inexperienced crew; Teddy pulls out all the stops to protect Alejandro; while visiting her dying father, Lucia has a realization.

episodes.name: Story of a Scar
episodes.overview: Franklin suffers the cost of his business; as Teddy's situation deteriorates, so does his mental state; Gustavo and Lucia struggle with how to proceed.

episodes.name: The Rubicon
episodes.overview: Franklin solidifies his future. Teddy’s hand is forced. Lucia decides between business and family.

episodes.name: Sightlines
episodes.overview: Franklin struggles to keep up with the demands of his growing organization. As political tides shift, the CIA cuts Teddy’s support, as he travels to recruit a new pilot. Feeling pressure to expand her business, Lucia crosses a line to impress a dangerous new partner.

episodes.name: The Day
episodes.overview: Franklin finds a new cocaine connect in the form of his captor, Reed Thompson. Lucia and Gustavo contemplate whether or not to let Pedro back into the business.

episodes.name: Prometheus Rising
episodes.overview: Two murders tear a divide in Franklin's crew and set them on a collision course with Lucia, who has an agenda of her own. Teddy and Matt must appease their Colombian partners.

episodes.name: Jingle Bell Rock
episodes.overview: With morale dipping, Franklin takes steps in order to ensure his crew's loyalty. Lucia’s guard starts to come down after a dramatic encounter, but some of her compassion may be misguided. Teddy is confronted with the sins of the past, causing Matt to see his brother in a new light.

episodes.name: Serpiente
episodes.overview: When Franklin needs Teddy's help to clear the air with an old partner, Teddy sees a business opportunity. Lucia comes to the realization not everyone in her crew is who they seem to be.

episodes.name: The Offer
episodes.overview: Franklin must deal with his past in order to retrieve stolen merchandise. Teddy and Matt take a trip to Central America. Now in the crosshairs of La Fuerza, Lucia and Gustavo set out to find the one thing that can save them.

episodes.name: The World Is Yours
episodes.overview: Franklin attempts to reinforce that business comes first when an employee steps out of line. Teddy and Matt run into some unexpected company when trying to get their business back on track. Lucia and Gustavo make an offer.

episodes.name: Surrender
episodes.overview: Franklin resorts to extreme measures when dissatisfaction in his crew reaches a fever pitch. Lucia and Gustavo secure a deal to save their lives.

episodes.name: Aftermath
episodes.overview: Franklin receives some devastating news. Teddy attempts to turn a foe into an ally. Lucia and Gustavo make plans to leave L.A.

episodes.name: Education
episodes.overview: Franklin faces the consequences of his actions. Teddy pulls out all the stops to assist his partners. Lucia must sacrifice to save Gustavo's life.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season 2 enters 1984, with everyone working toward their ultimate goals of money, power, and influence amid the Los Angeles crack cocaine epidemic.

episodes.name: Protect and Swerve
episodes.overview: Franklin and Cissy look to make an investment in the community, while Andre tries to figure out what is destroying it. Jerome unveils his new business. A new cook on the streets is competing with Franklin's crew. Teddy's operation in Mexico becomes more complicated.

episodes.name: The More You Make
episodes.overview: Faced with mounting problems on the street, Franklin pivots his business model. Andre investigates a murder connected to Franklin's family. Teddy uses Gustavo to help broker a new deal in Mexico, then receives a surprise visitor upon returning home.

episodes.name: Cash and Carry
episodes.overview: Franklin puts his new business plan into motion, then takes a business trip with Avi. Teddy and Julia work hard to forge new alliances in Costa Rica. Gustavo struggles to learn how to work with his new Mexican partner.

episodes.name: The Game That Moves As You Play
episodes.overview: Franklin and Melody reconnect. The LAPD takes a stand against Franklin’s growing operation. Teddy is forced to clean up Gustavo’s mess. Andre’s fight with the Saint Family becomes personal.

episodes.name: The Bottoms
episodes.overview: Andre is forced to ask for Franklin's help. Julia proposes a new plan to Teddy. Gustavo clears the way for his own vision.

episodes.name: Confessions
episodes.overview: Alton confronts Franklin about his government alliance. Julia helps Teddy meet Rigo’s demands. Gustavo gets proactive.

episodes.name: Pocket Full of Rocks
episodes.overview: Andre is forced to ask for Franklin's help. Julia proposes a new plan to Teddy. Gustavo clears the way for his own vision.

episodes.name: Hedgehogs
episodes.overview: Andre receives help from an unexpected source. Franklin finds himself exposed. Julia forces Teddy’s hand.

episodes.name: Blackout
episodes.overview: Franklin struggles with the fallout from his actions as his family prepares for the worst. Teddy scrambles to keep his operation afloat. Gustavo unveils his plan for the future.

episodes.name: Other Lives
episodes.overview: Franklin walks a different path. Life in South Central begins to change forever.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In Season 3, crack cocaine is spreading like wildfire through South Central Los Angeles, continuing its path of destruction and changing the culture forever.

episodes.name: Re-Entry
episodes.overview: With violence in South Central ramping up, Franklin attempts to stop a gang war from exploding. Gustavo and Teddy deal with pipeline issues. Local reporter Irene Abe attempts to understand what's happening to her neighborhood. Leon charts a new path.

episodes.name: Weight
episodes.overview: Chaos reigns as Franklin's plans go awry and he turns to an old flame for help. Leon struggles without Franklin. Cissy takes a more active role in Franklin's business. Gustavo's world is shaken. Irene finds her way to Alton's shelter.

episodes.name: All The Way Down
episodes.overview: Franklin's troubles extend beyond the gangs, putting Cissy in jeopardy. Teddy and Gustavo seek revenge.

episodes.name: Expansion
episodes.overview: Franklin's missteps put Leon in the crosshairs, resulting in an unexpected reconnection. Teddy faces fallout from Tijuana. Irene's investigation has a promising new lead. Franklin tries to appease Cissy.

episodes.name: The Get Back
episodes.overview: Franklin is torn between business and loyalty, as tragedy causes alliances to shift. Teddy bails out Gustavo. Irene's investigation moves closer to the Saint family.

episodes.name: Say a Little Prayer
episodes.overview: Franklin suffers the consequences of his choices. Jerome and Louie expand the business. Teddy is sent reeling. Irene delivers an ultimatum.

episodes.name: Through a Glass, Darkly
episodes.overview: Franklin is blindsided. Teddy and Avi travel to Panama to retrieve stolen cash.

episodes.name: Betrayal
episodes.overview: Franklin's world explodes into chaos. Teddy goes up the proverbial river.

episodes.name: Sleeping Dogs
episodes.overview: Franklin suffers the cost of his business. As Teddy’s situation deteriorates, so does his mental state. Gustavo and Lucia struggle with how to proceed.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight
episodes.overview: Franklin's family fractures. Teddy makes a difficult decision. Gustavo chooses a new path.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: In season four, Franklin tries to regain control over his business.

episodes.name: Comets
episodes.overview: It’s the summer of 1986 and the Saint crew has leveled up. Franklin’s personal and professional relationships are flourishing, but a problem in the valley brings trouble to his door.

episodes.name: Commitment
episodes.overview: Teddy forces his way back into the CIA’s operation in Los Angeles. Franklin and Veronique have a business proposition for Jerome and Louie.

episodes.name: Lions
episodes.overview: Teddy's return causes tension, forcing Jerome and Louie to negotiate with Skully.

episodes.name: Revolutions
episodes.overview: The LAPD's C.R.A.S.H. Unit raids the projects. Cissy returns from Cuba.

episodes.name: The Iliad (1)
episodes.overview: A brutal attack leaves the Saint crew in chaos.

episodes.name: The Iliad (2)
episodes.overview: Franklin and Gustavo look for an escape. Teddy is forced to put his trust in an old friend. The man behind the hits is revealed.

episodes.name: Lying in a Hammock
episodes.overview: Jerome tries to track down Peaches. The Saint crew diverges on what to do next.

episodes.name: Celebration
episodes.overview: The family gathers for Jerome and Louie's wedding and is promptly sent down the rabbit hole.

episodes.name: Departures
episodes.overview: Jerome and Louie separate themselves from Franklin.

episodes.name: Fault Lines
episodes.overview: Franklin is decimated. Teddy moves to secure his future. The family fractures.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Set in the summer of 1986, Franklin Saint  and his entire family are rich beyond their wildest dreams, on the verge of having everything they've ever wanted... right as the ground begins to fall out from under their feet. The sudden and tragic death of basketball star Len Bias makes the rock cocaine epidemic front-page news, the target of both Democrat and Republican lawmakers. Law enforcement is on a warpath and the militarization of the L.A.P.D. continues as police and politicians decide the only way to deal with this growing scourge is through force - and the creation of the new C.R.A.S.H. (Community Resources Against Street Hoodlums) units. The streets of South Central Los Angeles have never been so dangerous as the Saint family navigates the police, the warring gangs and the CIA.

episodes.name: Fallout
episodes.overview: Franklin fights to keep his business afloat. Jerome and Louie strike back.

episodes.name: The Sit Down
episodes.overview: Cissy introduces Franklin to the KGB, while also trying to broker peace within the family. Veronique enlists outside help to track Franklin's money.

episodes.name: Door of No Return
episodes.overview: Leon and Wanda return from Ghana to a very different world than the one they left behind.

episodes.name: Projects Boy
episodes.overview: Franklin is forced back out onto the street while Veronique and Cassandra pursue his stolen money. Leon and Big D clash. Teddy starts hunting his KGB counterpart.

episodes.name: Ebony and Ivory
episodes.overview: Franklin confronts Teddy's father; Leon solidifies control of the projects.

episodes.name: Concrete Jungle
episodes.overview: Franklin braces for fallout. Kane seeks revenge.

episodes.name: Charnel House
episodes.overview: Teddy and Franklin close in on each other. Gustavo runs out of time.

episodes.name: Ballad of the Bear
episodes.overview: Franklin and Gustavo set a plan in motion.

episodes.name: Sacrifice
episodes.overview: Franklin attempts to recover his stolen money.

episodes.name: The Struggle
episodes.overview: The Snowfall saga comes to an end.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: It’s October 1986 in this sixth and final season, as civil war threatens to destroy the Saint family. Franklin is desperate and forced to rob his Aunt Louie and Uncle Jerome after being wiped out by former CIA officer Teddy McDonald. Meanwhile, Louie has taken over Franklin’s role as Teddy’s sole buyer, undercutting her nephew and creating a competing empire in the process. Franklin is now faced with losing everyone he loves and everything he’s built, and coming through it all will mean out-maneuvering the KGB, the DEA and the CIA, as well as avoiding the LAPD’s fully militarized, fully corrupt, C.R.A.S.H units.
